hints.title: Main Research Question
hints.content:
23: :label: prob-revival-kl-mean-field
24: 
25: Let $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ be the mean-field revival operator defined in [05_mean_field.md](05_mean_field.md):
26: 
27: $$
28: \mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d](x,v) = \lambda_{\text{revive}} \cdot m_d \cdot \frac{\rho(x,v)}{\int_\Omega \rho}
29: $$
30: 
31: where $m_d = 1 - \int_\Omega \rho$ is the dead mass and $\lambda_{\text{revive}}$ is the revival rate.
32: 
33: **Question**: Is $\mathcal{R}$ **KL-non-expansive**? That is, does it satisfy:
34: 
35: $$
36: D_{\text{KL}}(\mathcal{R}(\rho) \| \mathcal{R}(\sigma)) \le D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \sigma)
37: $$
38: 
39: for all alive densities $\rho, \sigma \in \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ with $\int \rho = \int \sigma < 1$?
40: 
41: **Status**: **UNPROVEN CONJECTURE**
